content.rendered:
[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1579706454951{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Hotel Services

[vc_column_text]

Our highly personalized service, friendly staff and the latest technology trends provide a relaxing carefree stay regardless of whether you enjoy the selected services in the comfort of your room, hotel premises or while exploring Zagreb. Just enjoy yourself.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1654593959009{padding-top: 110px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

Esplanade Concierge

Come to us for information on restaurants, clubs, city events, theatre, concerts, tours, sports fixtures, tickets, hairdressing and just about anything else.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Esplanade hotel App

Download the hotel app, scroll through the latest news, stay updated on interesting events and promotions, or use the app to effortlessly order food and beverages to your room.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Press Reader

Simply download the Press Reader App and enjoy reading more than 7,000 local and foreign newspapers and magazines on your smart phone or tablet. Its free during your stay!

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Limousine Service

Choose the time and place, and a uniformed chauffeur will gladly be at your service.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Tesla Charger

Owners of the Tesla electric cars have the possibility of freely charging their vehicles with Tesla Destination Charger.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Porsche Charger

Prestigious brands Porsche and Esplanade Zagreb Hotel have united their visions to enable guests to charge their hybrid vehicles from now on - for free!

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Very Important Dog

Allow your loyal pet to enjoy all wondrous charms of the Esplanade Zagreb Hotel, receiving a VIP dog welcome in the room and a specially designed dog bed.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Esplanade Wi fi 2 Go

Connect to your own private fast Internet and surf carefree anywhere outside the hotel.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Esplanade View

Dive into our world with the newest edition of the glossy Esplanade View magazine. Check out interesting life stories, fashion editorials, glamorous social events and much more.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Read

Segway Zagreb City Tour

Simply unite with the positive energy of the streets of Zagreb absorbing the historical Upper Town and popular locations in the city centre.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Old Zagreb Tour

Try this ecologically sustainable and adventurous sightseeing city tour. Welcome aboard.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Halal Service

The hotel was awarded the Halal Certificate of Quality - a commitment that guarantees guests the services of hotel accommodation, gastronomy and wellness according to strict Halal standards.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Gluten Free Certificate

It enables you to safely enjoy eating and ordering dishes which suit your dietary needs and habits.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1663930079544{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]

Hotel Services
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1654592161275{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″]

Rent an electric scooter and enjoy an exciting ride while experiencing the city from a different perspective. Contact the concierge, who can also organise a sightseeing tour of the city on scooter, led by an official tourist guide.

Our range of services include Concierge, Limousine hire, Esplanade App, hotel Magazine The View, Press Reader Hot Zone, destination chargers for Tesla and Porsche vehicles, Exclusive gift selection as well as special Bath menu, VID treatment for your four-legged friends, and much more.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1661158221952{border-bottom-width: 50px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

Contact us

[vc_column_text]

Come to us for information on restaurants, clubs, city events, theatre, concerts, tours, sports fixtures, tickets, hairdressing and just about anything else.

Contact Concierge:
T. +385 1 45 66 055
E. concierge@esplanade.hr

Follow us. Share your Story.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
